response.original_title: Uncle Nick and the Magic Forest-lost in the magic forest
response.overview: Uncle Nick, a very nice old man in his seventies, is a popular story teller in a busy childrens' neighborhood. He tells stories about a place he discovered while fishing... a magic gorest. The forest has talking flowers and animals that talk, sing, and dance. In the forest, there are many beautiful trees, bush, and plants. The two most popular animals are O.D. Coyote and Che Che Bee Birdie, with their best friend flora flower. When Uncle Nick found the forest he saved Flora s life. Only nice people and children can go to the Magic Forest But future stories will show Uncle nick bringing troubled children to help them and One child sneaks into the Magic forest and gets lost.
response.title: Uncle Nick and the Magic Forest-lost in the magic forest
